```{=html}
  <div class="sb-stats__inner">
    <h2 class="sb-stats__title">The change we made</h2>

    <div class="sb-stats__grid">
      <article class="sb-card">

  <style>
    .sb-stats { 
      padding: 4rem 1rem; 
      background: #ffffff;   /* light background */
      color: #222;
    }
    .sb-stats__inner { max-width: 1100px; margin: 0 auto; text-align: center; }
    .sb-stats__title { 
      margin: 0 0 2rem; 
      font-size: clamp(1.6rem, 1.2rem + 1.5vw, 2.2rem); 
      font-weight: 700; 
      color: #4B0082; /* purple heading */
    }
    .sb-stats__grid { 
      display: grid; 
      grid-template-columns: repeat(4, 1fr); 
      gap: 1.5rem; 
    }
    @media (max-width: 900px){ .sb-stats__grid{ grid-template-columns: repeat(2, 1fr);} }
    @media (max-width: 520px){ .sb-stats__grid{ grid-template-columns: 1fr; } }

    .sb-card {
      background: #fafafa;
      border: 1px solid #eee;
      border-radius: 16px;
      padding: 2rem 1.5rem;
      box-shadow: 0 6px 18px rgba(0,0,0,.08);
      display: grid; place-items: center;
      aspect-ratio: 1 / 1;
      transition: transform .25s ease, box-shadow .25s ease;
    }
    .sb-card:hover { 
      transform: translateY(-4px); 
      box-shadow: 0 10px 28px rgba(0,0,0,.15); 
    }

    .sb-num {
      font-size: clamp(2rem, 1.3rem + 3vw, 3rem);
      font-weight: 800; 
      color: #6A0DAD; /* deep purple */
    }
    .sb-label {
      margin-top: .6rem;
      font-size: 1rem; 
      color: #555;
    }
  </style>

  <script>
    (function(){
      const nums = document.querySelectorAll('.sb-num');
      const format = new Intl.NumberFormat(undefined);
      const prefersReduced = window.matchMedia('(prefers-reduced-motion: reduce)').matches;

      function animate(el){
        const target = Number(el.dataset.target || '0');
        const suffix = el.dataset.suffix || '';
        const duration = Number(el.dataset.duration || '1200');
        if (!Number.isFinite(target) || prefersReduced) {
          el.textContent = format.format(target) + suffix;
          return;
        }
        let startTs = null;
        const easeOutCubic = t => 1 - Math.pow(1 - t, 3);

        function tick(ts){
          if (!startTs) startTs = ts;
          const elapsed = ts - startTs;
          const p = Math.min(1, elapsed / duration);
          const eased = easeOutCubic(p);
          const val = Math.round(target * eased);
          el.textContent = format.format(val) + suffix;
          if (p < 1) requestAnimationFrame(tick);
        }
        requestAnimationFrame(tick);
      }

      const io = new IntersectionObserver((entries, obs) => {
        entries.forEach(entry => {
          if (entry.isIntersecting){
            animate(entry.target);
            obs.unobserve(entry.target);
          }
        });
      }, { threshold: 0.35 });

      nums.forEach(n => io.observe(n));
    })();
  </script>
</section>
```
